physical_appearance: This is a beaded purse in a semicircular shape. Made from red velvet, the face of the purse is decorated with embroided beads and stitching. There is a bead button in the center, holding the flap closed. The purse is decorated with floral motifs along the border. In the center, there is a beaded butterfly, with a flower stalk on either side.
sgcool_label_text: This dompet has a unique semi-circular shape quite unlike other envelope purses. Chain and bullion stiches are used to create the contours of a butterfly and two stalks of flowers. Unlike Chinese purses which were either square or circular in shape, the purses made for or by the Peranakan community show more variation.
title_text: Dompet with Beaded Butterfly and Flower Design Beaded purse with butterfly and flower design
